rewrite: java.sql.Timestamp /* Spanner supports JDBC native types, these should be used directly by Spanner */
int recordId /* Spanner natively supports integer IDs */
#include <grpcpp/grpcpp.h> /* gRPC usage is usually not Spanner-related, it does not need to be translated to support other databases. */
INSERT <...> RETURNING <table_id_column> /* Use a sequence with CREATE SEQUENCE for IDs.  Spanner no longer requires UUID-based PKs.  PKs and IDs can be of type INT. */
